name: Project Kawasaki
description:
Project Kawasaki is a narrative that follows the story of troublemaker and emotionally shattered, Ayame Kawasaki. She recently finished her rehabilitation following her mother’s suicide, which she believes was her fault. The player assumes the role as Ayame as she starts her new life as a repeating second-year at Yamada High School, meeting new people and reconciling with the old. The game is centered around building friendships, developing personality, and partaking in various activities to advance the story.

*This prototype goes on for one week in game time. Enjoy! ^^

How to Play

Continue/Confirm: Spacebar, Enter, Left Mouse Click, Mousewheel roll
Skip Dialogue: Ctrl

Disclaimer

The game is currently in development. The characters in this game were created by Mangoku418 himself. The background images and music belong to their respective owners and are temporarily used to convey the feeling of the story. These will be replaced in the future with original content as development progresses.

If you have any thoughts/suggestions or would like to support this game, please consider leaving a comment below and following me on social media!  Thank you!
